meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of tholeiite.
meanings.sent1: The tholeiitic rocks in the area have a dark color.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the tholeiitic composition of the rock sample.
meanings.sent3: The tholeiitic nature of the stone made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as tholeiitic as the volcanic rock formations.
meanings.sent5: The tholeiitic properties of the mineral were evident under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The tholeiitic mixture created a strong foundation for the building.
meanings.sent2: The expedition discovered a cave with tholeiitic walls.
meanings.sent3: The tholeiitic blend of spices gave the dish a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a tholeiitic blend of logic and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The tholeiitic content of the soil affected the plant growth significantly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a type of basaltic rock.
meanings.sent1: The tholeiitic lava flow cooled rapidly, forming distinct patterns.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range was known for its tholeiitic formations.
meanings.sent3: The tholeiitic characteristics of the stone made it ideal for construction.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as tholeiitic rock.
meanings.sent5: The tholeiitic structure of the mountain was a sight to behold.
